title: How it feels to have your gameplay post downvoted when it had a valid point.

replies.body:
Careful bro
I got a 1 day ban some time ago for that same image

> [{quoted}](name=BloodyTompon,realm=OCE,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=ET1kisXE,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2016-07-31T01:56:17.603+0000)
>
> ...why?

They said it was violent or some shit I dunno
it is pretty violent, but I love it so damned much.
Post graves smoking to really rustle their jims.

You can eat and axe a child in half.
God forbid you post a picture with blood on it.

I swear the amount of stupid coming from mods, rivals nazi mods from Reddit at times.
